author: Jasmin Carter
comment: I love this watch face, beautifully designed. The only recommendation I would make is to add a step counter.
title: Beautiful design!

author: Anthony Scriba
comment: Any way to change or get rid of the title banner G Watch R? I'm using a Huawei watch...
title: Change Watch R title?

author: Scott Meckley
comment: I need all watchfaces ever made.
title: Not my favorite but

author: Paul Yoo
comment: Love everything else but the wrong weather. Should use other source like yahoo..

author: Jamie Spruce
comment: App icon not showing on phone and 'open' button not showing on playstore - the settings are only accessible through the 'android wear' app on phone. Puzzling.
title: App Icon no longer shows on phone...

author: John Hayden
comment: I like the design and functionality. But the only 2 things I would like you to add is: 1. A step counter display. (Enable/Disable in settings). 2. Screen timeout to ambient mode timeout. (Ex. Default, 3 seconds, 5 seconds, 8 seconds, 10 seconds, 15 seconds, 20 seconds, 30 seconds).  If you are able to add these features I will re-rate as a 5 star app. Thanks, I do like to support developers!
title: Very nice design!

author: Godfrey Zammit
comment: Pls add some color themes. Also noted that when 24h is selected, the dimmed mode remains 12h on the outer ring - pls fix.
title: Nice but...

author: Veronicca Lakewood
comment: Does not seem to be pressent on my device. How do you install this watch face? Couldn't find . Uninstalling . Refunding .

reply.author: Smartwatch Bureaux
reply.content:
Thank you for your feedback.
First of all,Would you please check android version of your wear.
Please feel free to contact our email address.we can give you a help.Thank you.

title: Wont show up

author: Derek Wilson
comment: Is there anyway to modify this so that there is no burn in?? It would be nice for there to be ambient mode options where you can disable alot of the options when ambient. Is there anyway to get the file so I can do it? I love your faces but I can't justify buying more without an ambient mode. Just like the seconds counter dissapears during ambient can you make other ones as well? Please let me know if I can help
title: Great but..

author: Afram Kirmiz
comment: Issues resolved, thanks for a great watch face and awesome support!

reply.author: Smartwatch Bureaux
reply.content:
Thank you for your feedback.
I've updated the app.Would you please check the latest ver.Thank you.

title: Issues from 1/8 update fixed in 1/10 update

author: Eric Belcher
comment: Love the watch face. Only complaint is I cannot get it to work with tilt to wake
title: Great face!

author: Sean Erswell-Liljefelt
comment: Very nice if a bit heavy on battery unfortunately
title: Like it

author: Ira Solod
comment: Excellent watchface. Thanks for the update.

reply.author: Smartwatch Bureaux
reply.content:
Thank you for your feedback.
I've updated the app available for Android Wear 5.0 firmware.
Would you please check the update.Thank you.

title: Favorite watchface

author: Kelly G
comment: I like to turn the brightness down a bit to prevent the faces from looking cartoonish. This face is wonderfully over-complex. Love it!
title: Really neat watch face

author: Michael Lynady
comment: If you could add option to choose watch name on face that would be great - moto 360-sent dev email about solution-hoping to resolve-UPDATE-dev refunded quickly & purchased 360 version-thx
title: Great face

author: John R
comment: This is by far the best watch face out. It looks great and has everything on one screen that you could want
title: Best face yet

author: Gessin Pineda
comment: Amazing highly recommended for the LG G Watch R

author: Stephen Overton
comment: Love the design and functions provided.
title: Great Design
